page.html: Hi there. I’m Atte Juvonen and this is my personal blog. I ramble about code, data, and other geeky interests. This blog is open sourced on GitHub, feel free to submit corrections or use the code to create your own blog.

Hi there. I’m Atte Juvonen and this is my personal blog.
I ramble about code, data, and other geeky interests.
This blog is open sourced on

,
feel free to submit corrections or use the code to create your own blog.
